h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Guanyin's Willow Leaf Location
content: The Guanyin's Willow Leaf Soak can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain in your New Game Plus through. When you revisit him, you can purchase it for 14,400 Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guanyin's_Willow_Leaf.md', within the main section titled 'Guanyin's Willow Leaf', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Guanyin's Willow Leaf Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Guanyin's Willow Leaf Soak can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain in your New Game Plus through. When you revisit him, you can purchase it for 14,400 Will.
